name: Ragna Maya
description: Play as the Dullahan in this retro-modern multi-turn based JRPG, as he makes his way deeper into the Labyrinth of Razuri on a quest to take back his head from the Witch who killed him.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: AMD FX-8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon R7 370 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: AMD FX-8350 or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon R7 370 or better Storage: 5 GB available space
